meanings.definition: A container or receptacle for holding work materials or supplies.
meanings.sent1: The workbaskets in the office are filled with pens and papers.
meanings.sent2: She organized her art supplies in different workbaskets.
meanings.sent3: The workbaskets decided to go on strike until they were filled with more tools.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a workbasket overflowing with creative ideas.
meanings.sent5: The workbaskets lined up neatly on the shelves, ready for use.

meanings.definition: A type of basket used for organizing and storing sewing or crafting materials.
meanings.sent1: Grandma's workbaskets were full of colorful threads and buttons.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new workbasket to keep her knitting yarn organized.
meanings.sent3: The workbaskets at the craft fair had a competition to see who could hold the most supplies.
meanings.sent4: Her love for crafting was woven into every workbasket she owned.
meanings.sent5: The workbaskets on the shelf resembled a rainbow of creativity.
